pages.title: Aerborn
pages.text: Collecting materials from the $(thing)Nether$() was a good start, but continuining our progress is going to require further dimension hopping. One of our next stops is the plane known as the $(thing)Aether$(). At first glance, it seems the polar opposite of the $(thing)Nether$() - a paradise rather than hell. But in my experience, it is every bit as deadly, if not even moreso.

The $(thing)Portal$() gateway to access the $(thing)Aether$() is built the same as the $(thing)Nether Portal$(), but with $(item)Glowstone$() in place of $(item)Obsidian$(). Once built, use one of the $(item)Otherworlds' Cores$() to activate it.

pages.name: Aether Portal
pages.text: Portal Frame can be various sizes (Frame size shown is the smallest allowed). Activate with an $(item)Otherworlds Core$().
